title: PLAIN HUGGIE EARRING, PEAR DROP, 14K YELLOW GOLD
description: A sleek 10MM hoop with an 0.18 carat pear cut lab-grown diamond or white sapphire drop.
details:
Metal: 14k yellow gold or 18k gold coated sterling silver
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire or diamond
Stone Shape: Pear cut
14K Gold Closure: 14K solid gold post 
18K Gold Coated Silver Closure: 10K solid gold post

White Sapphire Carat (Single):
10MM: 0.18 CTW DEW lab-grown white sapphire


Diamond Carat (Single):


10MM: 0.18 CTW lab-grown diamond


Fit Note: Model’s first piercing measures 6.10MM from piercing to bottom of earlobe.
Gold Color Note: Due to the mix of gold and alloyed metals 14k gold has a slightly lighter tone than 18k gold coated silver.
What is Lab-Grown?
